function.name: pango_font_face_describe
function.description: Returns the family, style, variant, weight and stretch of a #PangoFontFace. The size field of the resulting font description will be unset.
function.return: a #PangoFontDescription holding the description of the face.

function.name: pango_layout_get_tabs
function.description: Get the current #PangoTabArray used by this layout. If no #PangoTabArray has been set, then the default tabs are in use and an invalid instance is returned. Default tabs are every 8 spaces.
function.return: a copy of the tabs for this layout.
